episodes.title: Are There Cults in Catholicism?
episodes.description: The BITE Method is a cult mind control model created by former Moon cult member Dr. Steven Hassan.  In this episode we will look into the BITE Method, it's meaning, and whether religious orders check off any of the necessary boxes for being a cult.   https://www.alittlebithuman.com/the-bite-model-of-cult-mind-control-explained/  ---   Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/conventreform/support
